data: His baptismal name was William Barclay, but before the corn-coloured pencilling on his upper lip had foretold the coming of a moustache, he was known throughout that wide-flung region lying between the Platte and the Rio Grande, the Missouri and the Mountains, as Bat.
browsing: culture/civilization/society|browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: historical novels|category: adventure|category: novels|category: american literature
